Although nobody in this country dresses up in scary costumes on Halloween and instead everyone is coming to graveyards to lit candles on their family graves, I thought that getting some treats would be nice anyway ;-)
My LiveJournal Trick-or-Treat Haul
loretine goes trick-or-treating, dressed up as a Ritualist (wearing her snuggly and warm Norn armour).
acidofil gives you 8 softly glowing watermelon-flavoured gumdrops.
alexplanet tricks you! You get a piece of paper.
guitarlawman gives you 5 yellow pineapple-flavoured gumdrops.
kilmoon gives you 2 softly glowing strawberry-flavoured wafers.
locke_fox tricks you! You get a rock.
osymandus tricks you! You lose 1 pieces of candy!
rodneyorpheus gives you 17 teal banana-flavoured pieces of bubblegum.
sepheri gives you 15 dark blue pineapple-flavoured gumdrops.
loretine ends up with 46 pieces of candy, a piece of paper, and a rock.
Go trick-or-treating! Username:
Another fun meme brought to you by rfreebern.

I'm always impressed to hear that a friend of mine is having a book published that they have written or translated. I recently bought and am currently reading a book of Japanese folk fairy tales and legends that have been selected and translated by a dear friend of mine, .
Well done! I got one of the fairy tales already a couple of years ago with hand drawn illustrations and bound in red covers. Definitely one of the most original presents I've been given :-)
In Prague 5 years ago. The best show I have ever seen! From the first row. Is there anything better?

The Czech premiere of the Control movie will be held on Tuesday next week at 7 p.m. at the Slavic House here in Prague with Anthony Corbijn present in person! Moreover, there will be a special party afterwards starting at 9 p.m. dedicated to Joy Division and similar bands! A Czech flyer in pdf over here. So WHO is going with me? , perhaps? I will try to get a ticket for the premiere on the weekend. Oh, and the party should be great!

Oh I want to see this movie sometime.

Will I have bad luck now?

Ho-hum.
Ok, just found out that they do sell this in shops here. Will run to have a look at it on the weekend and it is very likely that I will bring it home :-) *all excited*

Oh, is there anyone who likes this song as very much as me? (People living in CR will surely know it from a TV advert). I absolutely love it! And the video fits to its atmosphere nicely I think. I have just watched it 3 times in a row. It was played today at H&M while I was trying on the skirt in the fitting room. And for a moment I was more impressed by the music then the piece of clothing. Does anyone know this Norwegian band at all? I have to explore their website and might see if I like the whole album "The Understanding", although as I read on the net it's not really great...

We just had a nice date in snow-covered mountains, but all pictures of us from up there are private ;-) Edit: I think I got it now. He might well be Keanu Reeves disguised as Mesmer :-D It all makes sense to me then :-)

On Monday night I saw Nine Inch Nails along with my brother and 5000 other people who were screaming and singing throughout the whole show. Unbelievable. Where they all came from I wonder? Well, I was coming round from the gig all day yesterday. There was so much energy flowing from the stage from the very first minute they started playing, so much power in the music, lots of shoving in the crowd that went absolutely mad... We stood no farther than 10 metres away from the stage and we just had to dance, because everyone around did. Trent's performance was totally amazing; you wouldn't say he is doing the same 2-hour show almost every night when the band is on tour at the moment. I have to say I don't much like most of the stuff they released after "The Downward Spiral", I think their latest album is really bad and their music has lost much of its originality and distinctiveness. The first record will always be my most favourite one and I think it is one of the best electro records ever made. Seriously. I still have the videos to "Head Like A Hole" and "Down In It" recorded on a video tape from MTV somewhere. I'd so much like to hear "Pretty Hate Machine" in surround sound sometime. It would sound just fantastic! Ah.
The Hand That Feeds video from the show (probably the best one from all videos available, the user posted some more though) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wilo5z7RSuE
Oh, and Trent said that we were the best fans of the whole tour so far and that the band would come back soon! The Czech fans win! Yay! :-)

Note to myself:

I dare to claim that the album "Waiting for the Sirens' Call" by New Order is even more brilliant than "Get Ready".

Amen.

By chance I've just found this.

Some more surprising facts about my personality...
Your Personality is Very Rare (INFP)
Your personality type is dreamy, romantic, elegant, and expressive. Only about 5% of all people have your personality, including 6% of all women and 4% of all men You are Introverted, Intuitive, Feeling, and Perceiving.
How Rare Is Your Personality?

A bit wild
Weak, transient effect: This morning the quality of time arouses an independent and rebellious spirit in you. You are inclined to do exactly the opposite of what someone suggests and to reject whatever others say simply because they said it. For the same reasons you are impatient with restraints, duties and responsibilities. There is a great need to be free and to do something very different, maybe even a little bit wild. You have a strong craving for excitement with this influence, and you may act in ways that you would never consider in a more sober mood. This could be either good or bad, of course, depending on how conservative you usually are and how unusual or outrageous the action. For some people this can be a very liberating influence. For others it is a bit too much.

***
Now I'm off to invoke the spirit of independence & rebellion. *grin* Which attribute is that? *ponder*

From Astro.com again 

Valid during many months: At this time you will reach a new understanding of your own being and the world around you. In recent years you have probably been through periods of great doubt, uncertainty and confusion. Although those periods were painful they have contributed to your new view of the world. Now is the time to deepen and take advantage of your new understanding. This is an excellent time for studies that can raise your consciousness, such as yoga, occult metaphysics, spiritualism and mysticism. Now you are able to study these subjects and put them into practice in your everyday life. They will not be purely intellectual or mental activities - you can make them real and useful!

From Astro.com

Soft lights
This influence stimulates your romantic imagination to a considerable degree, making you somewhat unrealistic in your dealings with loved ones. Usually this is not serious; this day may bring pleasant times of soft lights and romantic reveries. Daydreaming is also a characteristic of this influence, which is fine unless it interferes with necessity. In fact, this daydreaming tendency can manifest itself as artistic inspiration. If you are an artist, creativity of a high order can result. In relationships you must be most careful. You may expect your loved one to live up to an impossible romantic ideal that no one could or should try to attain. In most cases this influence has a short effect, constituting a passing mood and not a source of real problems.

I was made even happier today when I saw a beautiful Chinese-style dress at Orsay. I always wanted one, but wasn't lucky to find any really pretty. Well, until today when I bought this one!
It looks more beautiful in real and when put on of course. And it literally glows.

I think
sepheri
would love it too, unless she has a similar one already. It might be the right shade of red ;-)

It always makes me happy when I find something extraordinary pretty in shops in this city, because usually it costs lots of effort and patience (and of course I don't get satisfied with what most people like ;-) This morning I came across beautiful plates and bought 2 for myself and 2 for my mom. See it here, or even better in detail here. They had the whole set of them along with cups and a pot, but nothing from it looked as beautiful as the plates. If only I could find a pretty cutlery set now...

I'm wondering if I will ever be able to prepare a meal that would look even better than the plate itself! Chinaware that is both beautiful and challenging is just wonderful :-)

the Romantic
Thanks for taking the test !
you chose BY - your Enneagram type is FOUR.

"I am unique"

Romantics have sensitive feelings and are warm and perceptive.

How to Get Along with Me

  • Give me plenty of compliments. They mean a lot to me.
  • Be a supportive friend or partner. Help me to learn to love and value myself.
  • Respect me for my special gifts of intuition and vision.
  • Though I don't always want to be cheered up when I'm feeling melancholy, I sometimes like to have someone lighten me up a little.
  • Don't tell me I'm too sensitive or that I'm overreacting!

What I Like About Being a Four

  • my ability to find meaning in life and to experience feeling at a deep level
  • my ability to establish warm connections with people
  • admiring what is noble, truthful, and beautiful in life
  • my creativity, intuition, and sense of humor
  • being unique and being seen as unique by others
  • having aesthetic sensibilities
  • being able to easily pick up the feelings of people around me

What's Hard About Being a Four

  • experiencing dark moods of emptiness and despair
  • feelings of self-hatred and shame; believing I don't deserve to be loved
  • feeling guilty when I disappoint people
  • feeling hurt or attacked when someone misundertands me
  • expecting too much from myself and life
  • fearing being abandoned
  • obsessing over resentments
  • longing for what I don't have

Fours as Children Often

  • have active imaginations: play creatively alone or organize playmates in original game s
  • are very sensitive
  • feel that they don't fit in
  • believe they are missing something that other people have
  • attach themselves to idealized teachers, heroes, artists, etc.
  • become antiauthoritarian or rebellious when criticized or not understood
  • feel lonely or abandoned (perhaps as a result of a death or their parents' divorce)

Fours as Parents

  • help their children become who they really are
  • support their children's creativity and originality
  • are good at helping their children get in touch with their feelings
  • are sometimes overly critical or overly protective
  • are usually very good with children if not too self-absorbed

Renee Baron & Elizabeth Wagele

The Enneagram Made Easy
Discover the 9 Types of People
Harper SanFrancisco, 1994, 161 pages

I will be dj-ing again in Brno in two weeks (Sat 28th October) as it seems. All of the people I met in the club last Saturday (but not only them) are welcome to attend the event and demand requests. You know I do have a good taste ;-) Czech flyer under the cut below.

I'm wondering why those IKEAn screws are so damn difficult to screw into a single piece if IKEAn furniture??? I've just attached the second leg to my new table and my both hands are red and hurt, not mentioning the fact that I can now throw away the two screwdrivers I used for it and will have to buy a new one (or 2 perhaps). 

I need an electric screwdriver. Or a man around to do this task for me... :-(
